content: +description this is a crochet pattern for the evie cardigan an airy spring cardigan that will pair perfectly with all your favorite outfits it is made up of simple double_crochet stitches and twisted double_crochet stitches to create a unique texture from a cozy day on the couch to a night out on the town to your everyday wear this sweater is truly something that you need in your wardrobe this pattern includes instructions for sizes xs 36 - 5xl 68 +skill level this is a beginner level pattern +materials *approximately 850-1600 yards of category 3 light weight yarn depending on size *size i 5 5 mm crochet hook *yarn needle +more check out more of cactus and lace designs patterns here https //www etsy com/shop/cactusandlacedesigns or visit my website for other free patterns and tutorials https //cactusandlacedesigns com/ if you have any questions or difficulties with this pattern at all please don t hesitate to message me i would love to help answer any of your questions +share your work don t forget to follow along on social media to receive updates and to share your work instagram @cactus and lace ravelry ravelry com/people/cactusandlacedesigns pinterest https //www pinterest com/cactusandlacedesigns/ please tag me @cactus and lace in your pictures of your finished items i would love to see and share them and don t forget to use the hashtag #cactusandlacedesigns +pattern copyright please do not copy redistribute or sell my pattern in any way i hope you enjoy your finished evie cardigan if you choose to sell the finished product please credit me ashley cobb of cactus & lace designs and provide a link to www etsy com/shop/cactusandlacedesigns in your listings so that other makers can find me as well thank you for understanding ****all downloadable pdf patterns are non-refundable****
